channel.title: URGENT! MOPARSCAPE STAFF! Payed for mopar sponsor and didn't get it!
channel.description: So I won the bidding for the sponsorship and placed in 10th. I had clicked the buy now button and payed the asked amount; got the success email from paypal and everything. When I returned to the sponsored server bidding page it still says I paid $0. I thought it might of taken a while to process so I come back 8 hours later and it still says I haven't payed. Please help right away, my server name is Zarpor. Thanks!

item.title: URGENT! MOPARSCAPE STAFF! Payed for mopar sponsor and didn't get it!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Mopar took care of it. Sorry for the delay that you experienced.

Locked.

Read full topic
item.source: URGENT! MOPARSCAPE STAFF! Payed for mopar sponsor and didn't get it!
